body.name: OVIFM Streaming Webcam with Microphone Ring Light-HD 1080P Face Web Cam with Privacy Cover&Tripod for Desktop/Laptop/PC/MAC,Web Camera for Computer,Skype,YouTube,Zoom,Xbox One,Conference and PS4
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 38 mins
features: 【2K HD Webcam With Adjustable Ring Fill Light】OVIFM web cameras for computers has 2K resolution, 2560*1440 pixels which is clearer than 1080p webcam. It with 3 brightness levels, delivering different lighting requirements for your video chatting or streaming. Reduce particles and bring details in the dark environment. Provide you with excellent, undistorted images

【Tripod and Privacy Cover Comes With Computer Camera】For your convenience using. A flexible tripod and privacy cover are included in the package. With the help of flexible tripod, you can put your webcam in any place at your will. Don’t be constrained to clip the camera to the monitor. And the cover greatly protect your privacy

【Dual Noise Canceling Microphone and Autofocus】Webcam with microphone built-in, it helps to improve speech quality for crystal and clear audio. The background noise is filtered out so that you can be clearly heard. Pickup sound up to 9.8 foot. streaming webcam has autofocus function. No need to manually adjust the focus and you don't have to be conscious of keeping steady in front of the camera all the time

【Professional Streaming Camera for Computer】Web camera widely compatible with live streaming software such as OBS Xsplit, Facebook, Youtube, Team, Zoom, and Mixer etc. Perfectly compatible with Windows 7,8,10,XP system. Mac OS system, Linux system. Enjoy your smooth and clear video chatting, online class, or conference by the web cam

【Plug and Play - Easy to Use & Worry-free After-sales】You can use this desktop camera just out of the box! No any driver required. Don’t forget switch your input device to usb webcam. Otherwise, you still use the built-in camera. Don't worry about any after-sales problems. Any problem with the product, please contact us through your order to get a free replacement

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 297 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera for my desktop as I have recently started working on my master's degree. It has a great camera with an added LED light feature. It has a great price and does everything I need it to. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my 3d printer
reviews.reviewText: I have had some trouble with finding web cameras that worked well with Octoprint and my OrangePi. I noticed another use review that said they used this camera with their printer and decided to give it a go. I am not disappointed.Everything worked out of the box and I've had no crashes or issues with it being plugged in and on for a few weeks.The picture isn't 4K, but I didn't want/need 4k. The images in low light are a bit grainy, but turning on the camera light allows me to get a solid view of whats happening even if the light are off. (I've included 3 images from the camera under different light conditions full sunlight, overhead indoor lighting, and camera light only). Overall I think the camera quality is good, the build quality is solid, and you really can't go wrong with this device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Camera is incessantly glitching
reviews.reviewText: Camera will work one day and not the other. Alot of my job requires being in meetings on camera and I incessantly have to uninstall and reinstall the hardware for this camera. Only upside is the microphone seems to work. But also disconnects alot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We needed a cheaper camera for my daughter’s desktop for school purposes, and this one picks up sound very well (which was our main worry) and has a great quality picture. She now uses it not only for class work, but for her weekly extracurricular club meetings as well as chatting with friends. Great camera and wonderful price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars good value camera
reviews.reviewText: doesn't have a very good light filter but its a good camera for the money. i use it every day for business teams calls...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The camera is like on macro or has a quality of 480p.
reviews.reviewText: The product was worth the price but the description was misleading. The quality wasn't that high and it doesn't work for consoles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent camera,privacy shields may come off. The clamp isn't as strong as the mount, satisfied!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like how ergonomical and easy was to set up how it immediately recognize to my Xbox. What I don't like is how fluency the mount is and privacy shield but for 16 bucks won't 13 plus express shipping. It was very nice. I'm extremely satisfied. I highly recommend this to someone who is looking into streaming without breaking the bank at first 🤙🏽🫡

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Webcam for All Your Needs!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the OVIFM Streaming Webcam with Microphone Ring Light, and I am thoroughly impressed with its performance. The HD 1080P resolution ensures crystal-clear video quality for all my video calls and streaming sessions.The built-in microphone delivers clear audio without any distortions, making it a one-stop solution for all my communication needs. The ring light is a fantastic addition, providing perfect illumination for any lighting condition, ensuring I always look my best on camera.The included privacy cover is a thoughtful feature, giving me peace of mind when not using the camera. The tripod is sturdy and adjustable, making it easy to position the webcam at the perfect angle.
